ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and 'Ad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lut
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As did the people of 'Ad and Pharaoh and the brethren of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and so did 'Ad, and Pharaoh and Lot's brethren,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the tribe of A’ad, and Firaun, and the fellowmen of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And `Ad, and Fir`awn, and the brethren of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Ad and Firon and Lut's brethren,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Ad and Pharaoh, the brothers of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (the tribe of) A'ad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And the tribe of 'Ad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the A-ad, and Fir'awn. and the brethren of Lut.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and ‘Ad, Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The 'Ad, Pharaoh, the brethren of Lut,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And 'Ad, and Fir'aun (Pharaoh), and the brethren of Lout (Lot),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and Aad, Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Aad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:13] and ‘Ād, the people of Hūd, and Pharaoh, the brethren of Lot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (the tribe of) 'Aad) the people of Hud denied Hud, (and Pharaoh) and his folk denied Moses, (and the brethren of Lot) and the folk of Lot denied Lot,
